name: BountyHunter
description:
A prototype of the new platformer game i am working on.

This game in inspired by the old Konami game  "Sunset Riders" that I played back in my school days.

A simple action game where you would have to beat the bosses in each level and advance to the next until you meet the final Boss (yet to be decided).

Please share any ideas /feedbacks , those would be of great help and would motivate me to keep going on.
